settings.text: Easy and effortless exchanges. I had an item arrive that was a little too small. I was a bit hesitant to email and ask for an exchange due to my experiences with other brands but the Revella team responded right away and sent out a replacement item on the day and organised the return of my exchange item. Simple and easy.
settings.name: Stacey Reed
